definition.name: shim-auth-id
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLLDAPBASE.idmresource.NOVLLDAPBASEInitSettingsPrompts.gcv.dscr.shim-auth-id)Enter the Authentication Id for the driver.

definition.name: shim-auth-server
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLLDAPBASE.idmresource.NOVLLDAPBASEInitSettingsPrompts.gcv.dscr.shim-auth-server)Enter the Connection Information used by the driver to connect to the application.

definition.name: shim-auth-password
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLLDAPBASE.idmresource.NOVLLDAPBASEInitSettingsPrompts.gcv.dscr.shim-auth-password)Specify the password used by the driver to connect to the application.
